quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
author: Philip Fisher

quote: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: Wealth is not his that has it, but his that enjoys it.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Budgeting has only one rule: Do not go over budget.
author: Leslie Tayne

quote: Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: The goal isn’t more money. The goal is living life on your terms.
author: Chris Brogan

quote: Time is more valuable than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Never spend your money before you have earned it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Beware of little expenses; a small leak will sink a great ship.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: The quickest way to double your money is to fold it over and put it back in your pocket.
author: Will Rogers

quote: The best investment you can make is in yourself.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Money, like emotions, is something you must control to keep your life on the right track.
author: Natasha Munson

quote: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: It’s not your salary that makes you rich; it’s your spending habits.
author: Charles A. Jaffe

quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
author: Thomas Edison

quote: Debt is like any other trap, easy enough to get into, but hard enough to get out of.
author: Henry Wheeler Shaw (AKA Josh Billings)

quote: Money often costs too much.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The only way to permanently take control of your financial life is to dig deep and fix the root problem.
author: Suze Orman

quote: A man is usually more careful of his money than he is of his principles.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Before you speak, listen. Before you write, think. Before you spend, earn. Before you invest, investigate.
author: William A. Ward

quote: Every time you borrow money, you're robbing your future self.
author: Nathan W. Morris

quote: Don’t tell me what you value, show me your budget, and I’ll tell you what you value.
author: Joe Biden

quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
author: Epictetus

quote: Success is having to worry about every damn thing in the world, except money.
author: Johnny Cash

quote: The art is not in making money, but in keeping it.
author: Proverb

quote: When it comes to money, ignorance is NOT bliss. What you don't know CAN hurt you.
author: Sandra S. Simmons

quote: A budget tells us what we can't afford, but it doesn't keep us from buying it.
author: William Feather

quote: Saving must become a priority, not just a thought. Pay yourself first.
author: Dave Ramsey

quote: If you would be wealthy, think of saving as well as getting.
author: Benjamin Franklin
